rules_text:
Spirited
Dominomicon Abridged enters tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice a land: Discover 4. Activate only as as sorcery. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
